job.title: Data Scientist
job.description:
Job Summary:   &nbsp;We are looking for a Data Scientist responsible for maintaining fast growing datasets, developing custom data models, and extracting actionable insights to make Cercacor products more delightful and intuitive for customers.&nbsp;This position works in close collaboration with cross functional teams to influence product innovation.   Duties & Responsibilities:·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Build and expand machine learning models using NLP, classification, Neural Networks, etc. ·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Work with Engineers to integrate data from multiple sources and develop predictive algorithms.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Extract actionable insights from complex data sets and report insights via internal dashboards and visualization to Product teams for roadmap and feature decisions.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Review latest research papers and trends in the field of Artificial Intelligence and update team with new technologies.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Communicate findings and new trends with company leadership.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Conduct exploratory analysis and develop statistical models to answer key product usage and engagement questions.   - Help Product and Marketing teams use experimentation and cohorting to test assumptions and launch new marketing campaigns, features and product releases.    
  - Partner with Product teams to define and benchmark metrics for new features launches and initiatives and help create a culture of measurement.   
&nbsp;Minimum Qualifications and Experience:&nbsp;   ·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Master’s degree or higher in computer science, statistics, electrical engineering or other related fields.  - Proficiency in using Matlab, and Python.   
  - Proficiency in using data science toolkits such as Keras, Tensorflow, PyTorch, etc.   
·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Practical experience in time series analysis and sequential modeling.   - Prior experience developing machine learning approaches for modeling and predicting user behaviors.   
·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Prior experience building NLP pipelines for chatbots in a limited training data environment.  - Prior experience building REST APIs and interfacing applications with other 3rd party APIs.   
  - Ability to work independently and with moderate supervision.   
  - Exceptional organizational skills and problem-solving ability.   
  - Good communication skills, both verbal and written.&nbsp;   
   Desired Qualifications:&nbsp;·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience developing advanced prediction models with large dataset.
